description.value: You gain the @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.journals.JournalEntry.vx5FGEG34AxI2dow.JournalEntryPage.DOc3Pf8wmVxanTIv#basic-spellcasting-feat]{Basic Spellcasting Feat} benefits. Each time you gain a spell slot of a new rank from this archetype, add a spell of that spell rank from your chosen tradition to your repertoire-either a common spell or another spell you've learned or discovered.
